labels.name: P2: Fix can wait a while

data.actual_result: The SMS Authentication appears disabled in User Settings and you are asked to enter your password if you choose to enable it though this is only a visual bug (reloading the client fixes the problem/SMS Auth doesn't actually get disabled)
data.expected_result: SMS authenticatior shouldn't look like it's disabled
data.short_description: SMS Authentication appears disabled in User Settings after you enter your own profile
data.steps_to_repro: - Click your own user profile (make sure you are in the full profile modal) (optionally, you can load a game or play something on Spotify)- Close full modal and observeClicking to other profiles does not trigger the banner.
